segments.text: Peering into this indoor kitchen, I see the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate meticulously with her dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron suggests she's in the middle of chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink is overflowing profusely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushes over the edge, forming a large puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's ankle-deep in it, yet oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the counter, dishes are piled high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a beautiful, tidy garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes the inside mess seem even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, looking left, the cabinet is open to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on the two-step stool, which looks unsteady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching in, while the girl waits below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her open palm shows she's in on the cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn't give way.
segments.speaker: PAR
